entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have tracked down the missing Life Day candy, or what was left of it.
entries.journal_entry_description: Help Saun Dann find the missing Life Day candy.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Talk to the Shipping Master at the Keren starport.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Talk to the Shipping Master at the Mos Entha starport.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Investigate the Jawa Mountain Fortress for clues.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The last trace of this 'ghost' is the Mos Espa shuttle port.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Saun Dann with the bad news.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: After talking to Watto, return to Saun Dann with the bad news.
